quest.name: Cooler Tanks Prevail
journal:
Regitt likes it hot, but not too hot.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to Regitt.
objectives: Speak with the dwarven researcher at Inviolate Witness.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Ethanol has produced some astonishing results, but we've had our fair share of mechanical mishaps. The engines get so hot that sometimes they just start steaming like an elemental out of water!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: This problem must be squared away quickly, for without our tanks we'll have little to show for our time here besides barrels of ale! My men are hard at work building cooling devices for the engines, and I would have you lend them your expertise.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: The team has headed to Inviolate Witness to mine stones we might make use of, and if you head there now you should catch up with them. With all of you working together, I'm sure this burning issue will be quenched in no time at all!

dialogue.name: AUTOMATON03914
dialogue.text: <blip> <buzz>

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Ah, you're Regitt's workhorse. Here just in time, too─this rock we pulled out of the earth is still wet to the touch.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Word has it you've got a knack for crafting, so use it to make two cooling plates. A couple of those should absorb the brunt of the heat those engines give off. The automaton is here in case you run out of materials for any reason.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Word has it you've got a knack for crafting, so use it to make two cooling plates. A couple of those should absorb the brunt of the heat those engines give off. The automaton is here in case you run out of materials for any reason.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Word has it you've got a knack for crafting, so use it to make two vials of coolant. A couple of those should absorb the brunt of the heat those engines give off. The automaton is here in case you run out of ingredients for any reason.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Since I'm sure you're used to this by now, you know to deliver the finished goods to Regitt. When everything's all sorted, we mean to put these cooling agents to a live test.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Guess even someone with your reputation can't get it right every time. The automaton is standing by with any materials you might require.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Guess even someone with your reputation can't get it right every time. The automaton is standing by with any materials you might require.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: Guess even someone with your reputation can't get it right every time. The automaton is standing by with any ingredients you might require.

dialogue.name: AUTOMATON03914
dialogue.text: <beep> Materials detected. Request denied.

dialogue.name: AUTOMATON03914
dialogue.text: <beep> Materials detected. Request denied.

dialogue.name: AUTOMATON03914
dialogue.text: <beep> Ingredients detected. Request denied.

dialogue.name: AUTOMATON03914
dialogue.text: <beep> Request for materials acknowledged.

dialogue.name: AUTOMATON03914
dialogue.text: <beep> Request for materials acknowledged.

dialogue.name: AUTOMATON03914
dialogue.text: <beep> Request for ingredients acknowledged.

dialogue.name: DAILYDWARF03914
dialogue.text: All finished? Well, what're you waiting for? Deliver them to Regitt before he tans our hides!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Great work, as always! Ah, well, I suppose I shouldn't make assumptions. You did finish what I asked, right?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Wonderful! This should put a damper on those overactive engines. We'll begin testing these at once!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: You know, I'd wager gil to gingerbread that your masterwork here could be put to use in the ale vats as well... Ah, what am I saying! Tanks, then ale! Tanks, then ale!
